languages.text: "О многом задумался я, когда пал Крик скверны. Песнь, спетая мной в той битве, была полна черной ярости и тоски. Они больше не пугали меня".
"I thought many things when Doomscream fell. The verse I spoke in that battle was steeped in fury and despair. They no longer frightened me."
languages.original_text: "О многом задумался я, когда пал Крик скверны. Песнь, спетая мной в той битве, была полна черной ярости и тоски. Они больше не пугали меня".

traits.locale_text: "I thought many things when Balescream fell. The song I sang in that battle was steeped in fury and despair. They no longer frightened me."
"I thought many things when Balescream fell. The song I sang in that battle was steeped in fury and despair. They no longer frightened me."
"I thought many things when Balescream fell. The song I sang in that battle was steeped in fury and despair. They no longer frightened me."
"I thought many things when Doomscream fell. The verse I spoke in that battle was steeped in fury and despair. They no longer frightened me."

languages.text: «Pensé en muchas cosas cuando Doomscream cayó. El verso que proclamé en esa batalla estaba sumida en la furia y la desesperación. Ya no me daba miedo».
languages.original_text: "I thought many things when Doomscream fell. The verse I spoke in that battle was steeped in fury and despair. They no longer frightened me."

traits.locale_text: «Pensé en muchas cosas cuando Balescream cayó. La canción que entoné en esa batalla estaba sumida en la furia y la desesperación. Ya no me daba miedo».

languages.text: “灾啸倒下的时候，我想了很多。在那场战斗中，我颂唱的歌谣充满了愤怒与绝望，那些感情不再令我感到恐惧。”
languages.original_text: "I thought many things when Doomscream fell. The verse I spoke in that battle was steeped in fury and despair. They no longer frightened me."

traits.locale_text: “灾啸倒下的时候，我想了很多。在那场战斗中，我咏唱的歌谣充满了愤怒与绝望，那些感情不再令我感到恐惧。”

languages.text: 「ドゥームスクリームが堕ちたとき、たくさんのことを考えた。あの戦いで語った詞は怒りと絶望に満ちてた。もう俺はそれらを恐れたりしない」
languages.original_text: "I thought many things when Doomscream fell. The verse I spoke in that battle was steeped in fury and despair. They no longer frightened me."

traits.locale_text: 「ベイルスクリームが堕ちたとき、たくさんのことを考えた。あの戦いで歌った歌は怒りと絶望に満ちてた。もう俺はそれらを恐れたりしない」

languages.text: « Les pensées se sont bousculées dans ma tête, quand le Fléau Hurlant est tombé. Le verset que j'ai chanté pendant ce combat était empreint de fureur et de désespoir, mais je n'en ai plus peur désormais. »
languages.original_text: "I thought many things when Doomscream fell. The verse I spoke in that battle was steeped in fury and despair. They no longer frightened me."

traits.locale_text: « Les pensées se sont bousculées dans ma tête, quand le Fléau Hurlant est tombé. La chanson que j'ai chantée pendant ce combat était empreinte de fureur et de désespoir, mais je n'en ai plus peur désormais. »

languages.text: "Ich dachte vieles, als Unheilsschrei fiel. Der Vers, den ich in diesem Kampf rezitierte, war voller Zorn und Verzweiflung. Sie machten mir keine Angst mehr."
languages.original_text: "I thought many things when Doomscream fell. The verse I spoke in that battle was steeped in fury and despair. They no longer frightened me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich dachte vieles, als Unheilsschrei fiel. Das Lied, das ich in diesem Kampf sang, war voller Zorn und Verzweiflung. Sie machten mir keine Angst mehr."

languages.original_text: "I thought many things when Doomscream fell. The verse I spoke in that battle was steeped in fury and despair. They no longer frightened me."

languages.text: "Belanarası düştüğünde çok şey düşündüm. O savaşı anlattığım mısra, öfke ve çaresizlikle yoğruldu. Beni artık korkutmuyorlardı."
languages.original_text: "I thought many things when Doomscream fell. The verse I spoke in that battle was steeped in fury and despair. They no longer frightened me."

traits.locale_text: "Belanarası düştüğünde çok şey düşündüm. O savaşı anlattığım mısra, öfke ve çaresizlikle yoğuruldu. Beni artık korkutmuyorlardı."
